alert.note: Alert for Butte; Central Black Hills; Harding; Northern Black Hills; Northern Foot Hills; Northern Meade Co Plains; Perkins; Rapid City; Southern Black Hills; Southern Foot Hills; Ziebach (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued July 06 at 9:29AM MDT until further notice by NWS RapidCity
info.description: .Large amounts of water in the atmosphere are present today. Slow moving thunderstorms will continue to develop and expand over the area this afternoon and tonight. The expected slower movement of the storms combined with the high moisture content air may result in flash flooding through tonight. ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...Portions of South Dakota and Wyoming, including the following areas, in South Dakota, Bennett, Butte, Central Black Hills, Custer Co Plains, Fall River, Haakon, Harding, Hermosa Foot Hills, Jackson, Mellette, Northern Black Hills, Northern Foot Hills, Northern Meade Co Plains, Oglala Lakota, Pennington Co Plains, Perkins, Rapid City, Southern Black Hills, Southern Foot Hills, Southern Meade Co Plains, Sturgis/Piedmont Foot Hills, Todd, Tripp and Ziebach. In Wyoming, Northeastern Crook, Northern Campbell, Southern Campbell, Western Crook, Weston and Wyoming Black Hills. * WHEN...Through late tonight. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Slow moving thunderstorms with large amounts of moisture available are expected this afternoon and tonight. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Butte; Central Black Hills; Harding; Northern Black Hills; Northern Foot Hills; Northern Meade Co Plains; Perkins; Rapid City; Southern Black Hills; Southern Foot Hills; Ziebach
